page.title: 04RELIGION ASHBY M PEATLING P.
page.content:
There are C of E churches in both Ashby Magna and Peatling Parva.
St. Mary's, Ashby Magna is one of three churches cared for by the Reverend Etchells who lives at the modern vicarage built in the l95O's next to the church. Services are held every Sunday morning with an evening service monthly. The average attendance is lO. There are two church wardens included in a church council of 8.
St. Andrews, Peatling Parva is one of three churches cared for by the Reverend Brooks who is the vicar of Gilmorton. Services are held twice a month and the average attendance is l7. There are two church wardens and a church council.
